timeline.author: gAmUssA

timeline.message:
Merge pull request #327 from russau/rekeying-syntax-update

Rekeying syntax update

Updated KSQL tutorials - 0.8.x (#337)

Tested KSQL joins tutorials against 0.8.1 and found some issues, which are fixed below:

- PRINT command no longer needs the topic name quoting: it's now case sensitive. (fixed across all examples)
- TIMESTAMPTOSTRING should be passed a timezone for consistent results
- Added explicit ROWKEY columns to all CT/CS statements, as this is to be encouraged.
- Fixed key format output of PRINT that was outputting MIXED, which is not a valid output.

fixes #336


Co-authored-by: Andy Coates <big-andy-coates@users.noreply.github.com>
Adapt expected output for cli column-width setting
